archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1406
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a CSR I want to be able to escalate an existing trouble ticket in the CRM system so I can ensure a fault raised by a customer or internally is being addressed in a timely manner.

properties.value: OOTB Agent can comment the case and the person responsible for the case recieves the comment and can act on it. The other option is manual reasign the ticket to the e.g. Escataltion group Is it sufficient?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
